con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars/> <resources base="https://digital-villages-server.herokuapp.com/services/rest"> <resource path="/linemanagement/v1"> <resource path="/schedules/"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/stops/"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> <resource path="/security/v1"> <resource path="/csrftoken/"> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/currentuser/"> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> <resource path="/linemanagement/v1"> <resource path="/busses/"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/busses/{busId}/"> <param name="busId" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/customStops"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="requestId" style="query" type="xs:long"/> <param name="deviceId" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="lineId" style="query" type="xs:long"/> <param name="busId" style="query" type="xs:long"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/customStops/{customStopId}"> <param name="customStopId" style="template" type="xs:long"/> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/lines/"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/realTimeData/"> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/routes/"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/update/"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/updateBusStatus/"> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>
